original_solution_mapping.L1: First find how many text messages he sent on Tuesday: 220 messages / 2 = <<220/2=110>>110 messages
original_solution_mapping.L2: Then find how many text messages he sent Wednesday-Friday: 50 messages/day * 3 days = <<50*3=150>>150 messages
original_solution_mapping.L3: Then add up all the messages he sent to find the total: 110 messages + 150 messages + 220 messages = <<110+150+220=480>>480 messages

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2874.
    Returns: the average number of text messages sent per day.
    """
    # L1
    messages_monday = 220 # 220 text messages on Monday
    tuesday_divisor = 2 # half as many text messages on Tuesday
    messages_tuesday = messages_monday / tuesday_divisor

    # L2
    messages_wed_fri_per_day = 50 # 50 text messages each day Wednesday through Friday
    num_days_wed_fri = 3 # WK
    messages_wed_fri_total = messages_wed_fri_per_day * num_days_wed_fri

    # L3
    total_messages = messages_tuesday + messages_wed_fri_total + messages_monday

    # L4
    total_days = 5 # WK
    average_messages_per_day = total_messages / total_days

    # FA
    answer = average_messages_per_day
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: First find how many text messages he sent on Tuesday: {messages_monday} messages / {tuesday_divisor} = <<{messages_monday}/{tuesday_divisor}={messages_tuesday}>>{messages_tuesday} messages

Then find how many text messages he sent Wednesday-Friday: {messages_wed_fri_per_day} messages/day * {num_days_wed_fri} days = <<{messages_wed_fri_per_day}*{num_days_wed_fri}={messages_wed_fri_total}>>{messages_wed_fri_total} messages

Then add up all the messages he sent to find the total: {messages_tuesday} messages + {messages_wed_fri_total} messages + {messages_monday} messages = <<{messages_tuesday}+{messages_wed_fri_total}+{messages_monday}={total_messages}>>{total_messages} messages

Then divide that number by the number of days to find the average number of messages he sent per day: {total_messages} messages / {total_days} days = <<{total_messages}/{total_days}={average_messages_per_day}>>{average_messages_per_day} messages/day
